eng_context:
Unfortunately that's all it takes
to get you.

kor_context:
미안하군.
도시에 더 이상 가까이
가는 건 너무 위험해.
eng_context:
I'm sorry.
It's too dangerous to get any closer
to the city.

Of course it won't be a problem
for a priestess like you.

It would be very difficult to fight
with the leaves<..>.

But I do believe you will
stop the curse.

Didn't it spread to the land where
you live?

kor_context:
지금 자네에게 최선의 선택은
여왕 폐하를 뵙는 것이야.
eng_context:
Your best option now is to see
Your Majesty the Queen.
